message: Let's be fair, but I'm taking the lion's share. You get 10% this time, and I'll make a better offer next round if you decline.
You said I'd get a better offer next round, so here's my counteroffer. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worth it for me. This is my final offer.
I'm not falling for your 'final offer' trick. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think this is the last chance.
